nodes.name: Start
dialogue: Take me to floor 5.
Take me to floor 5.

nodes.name: Your Occupation
dialogue: Thanks. You know, you do the same thing every day, right? You enjoy that?

toNode: Some people will never amount to anything

nodes.name: Shutting down the place
dialogue: Huh, and people wonder why this place is shutting down. Newsflash: people like good service.
Huh, and people wonder why this place is shutting down. Newsflash: people like good service.

nodes.name: Asking Twice
dialogue: Hey- Hey! You there? Earth to bellhop! I don't like asking twice, friend. Fifth floor. Can you take me there?
Hey- Hey! You there? Earth to bellhop! I don't like asking twice, friend. Fifth floor. Can you take me there?

toNode: Some people will never amount to anything

nodes.name: Taking the initiative
dialogue: You know, you seem like a smart guy. If you want, I could put you in contact with some folks that might be looking for assistants.
There's more work out there, you know. More satisfying work. Might be worth looking into.
You should probably start looking into other jobs. Maybe not something like this, your skillset... not ideal for customer service.

nodes.name: Some people will never amount to anything
dialogue: You do? Hey I mean... I'd dream a bit higher, but... as long as you're happy...
Thank you. Look I undrstand your frustration but I mean, it's not like everyone can be successful. Bellhop, though...
Thank you. Look I undrstand your frustration but I mean, it's not like everyone can be successful. Bellhop, though...

nodes.name: What success truly means
dialogue: I mean, you're... not what I expect with people though. Are you really happy with so little? I mean, this job can't pay much- would you still consider yourself successful?
I mean, you're... not what I expect with people though. Are you really happy with so little? I mean, this job can't pay much- would you still consider yourself successful?
You get paid- what, minimum wage? Less? Dead-end job... You can't really be happy, can you?
toNode: Once a commoner, Always a commoner

nodes.name: The origin of the businessman
dialogue: I mean, when I was your age I was working a drive-thru. People came by, rich people, their fancy cars. One thing about fast-food: it knows no class. I always wanted to be like them, drive their cars...

See I was workin' a drive-thru when I was your age. Say what you will about that, at least I wasn't living in the past like here. No, I was looking for the future. Didn't want to live in the dirt like you seem content to. Wanted money. Wanted power. Wanted a life, an actual life.

See I was workin' a drive-thru when I was your age. Say what you will about that, at least I wasn't living in the past like here. No, I was looking for the future. Didn't want to live in the dirt like you seem content to. Wanted money. Wanted power. Wanted a life, an actual life.

nodes.name: Once a commoner, Always a commoner
dialogue: Huh. Well. I always dreamt big. Not sure about you.
Huh. Well. I always dreamt big. Not sure about you.
Yeah, you keep believin' that pal. Tell me all about it in my private jet.

nodes.name: Future job oppurtunity
dialogue: Hey, when you find yourself out of work when this place finally bites it, come see me. I might have something.
Ah I see you're inspired now. If you ever want to be a success like me, hit me up.
Ah I see you're inspired now. If you ever want to be a success like me, hit me up.
